p: It has been well documented that the influenza viral NA activity contributes to progeny virus release from an infected cell surface ( Du et al., 2019). We therefore examined whether CHLA and CHLI blocked viral release of IAV by inhibiting viral NA activity. A standard fluorimetric method was used ( Li et al., 2016), and the results showed that both CHLA and CHLI inhibited viral NA activity in a dose-dependent manner ( Figure 4B).
